We can prove that Man Made Global Warming is a lie without even digging up ice core samples or any of that.

In the 800 to 1100 very well documented Medevial period, it was warmer than it ever has been in our lifespan of industrialized mankind.
The warmer period was actually a benefit and life fluorished with crops growing where it has been too cold for hundreds of years!

The "mini ice age" happened after that warming period. 

Average temps fluctuate, mostly due to the sun cycles.
